title: WordBreakSpellChecker
description: A spellchecker that generates suggestions by combining two or more terms and/or breaking terms into multiple words. This would typically be used in addition to one of the existing spell checkers to get both traditional and word-break suggestions for the end user.

comments.content: This version adds a feature giving users more control over which words may be combined together.
comments.author: James Dyer
